entry.title: Adding SSZipArchive to Podfile
entry.content:
The podfile is for a osx 10.8 project. Here is the output from podfile install

Installing SSZipArchive (0.2.3) Using libextobjc (0.2.5) dtrace: failed to open framework/TestResources/CorePlotProbes.d: No such file or directory

entry.title: SSToolkit
entry.content:
Added SSToolkit to my Podfile and got this message. Don’t know what it means…

[!] [SSToolkit] Specification#config is deprecated. The config is accessible from the parameter passed to the hooks
